Extracted Data.Name: Preethi BR
Extracted Data.Summary or Objective: Results driven Data Analyst with 4.3 years of experience in Power BI, SQL, Python. Skilled in dashboard development, DAX, ETL. Known for delivering data driven insights, optimizing performance, and building scalable, intuitive BI solutions for business impact.

Experience.Title: Data Analyst
Experience.Description: Business Intelligence & Dashboard Development Designed and deployed 20+ interactive dashboards in Power BI, enabling global audit teams to visualize KPIs and make faster, insight driven decisions. Created 100+ custom DAX measures and Power Query transformations, improving report refresh speed by 30% and aligning with star/snowflake schemas. Published and maintained reports on Power BI Service, ensuring 100% compliance with data governance and visualization best practices. Data Analysis & Insights Discovered actionable insights across financial and operational datasets, directly influencing audit decisions and controls improvement. Performed root cause analysis on 100+ data variances, increasing data accuracy by 15% and strengthening audit data quality. Reporting Automation & Efficiency Automated 10+ recurring reports with Alteryx and Power BI, reducing reporting time by 25% and saving ~8 hours/week of manual effort. Developed 12+ reusable workflows in Alteryx, standardizing data preparation and reporting processes across teams. Used tools like DAX Studio, and Performance Analyzer to optimize refreshes, improving Power BI report performance by 20%. Data Modeling & Data Management Built normalized and denormalized models in SQL and Alteryx, enabling fast, scalable data retrieval and eliminating ~20% data redundancy. Maintained over 30+ dimension and fact tables, applying hierarchical relationships and granularity for flexible, dynamic reporting. Improved SQL query efficiency by 25% through indexing, aggregation, and performance tuning strategies. Stakeholder Collaboration & Communication Collaborated with 10+ cross functional stakeholders across APAC and EU to define KPIs, gather reporting requirements, and implement BI solutions. Served as primary point of contact for Netherlands onshore audit team, contributing to 90%+ SLA compliance for data deliverables. Maintained a 95% stakeholder satisfaction score, delivering accurate and insightful dashboards aligned with business goals. Leadership & Mentoring Led a team of 4 analysts, increasing team productivity by 30% through task delegation, upskilling, and effective time management. Conducted knowledge sharing sessions on Power BI, Alteryx, and SQL best practices, promoting continuous learning and tool adoption.

Certifications: Microsoft Certified: Power BI Data Analyst Associate Jan 2025 - Jan 2026
Extracted Data.Education: M. Tech: Pesit South Computer science Jun 2017 - May 2019 Bachelor Of Engineering: Mvj College Of Engineering, Bangalore Computer Science Jun 2011 - May 2015

Recommendations: Since the resume exceeds two pages, consider **condensing the content** by removing redundant information, focusing on the most impactful achievements, and using concise language to improve readability.

The resume lacks a **dedicated 'Projects' section**. To showcase practical skills and experience, create a section detailing personal or academic projects, highlighting the technologies used and the outcomes achieved.

While the skills section is comprehensive, consider **categorizing skills** further into sub-sections (e.g., 'Data Visualization Tools', 'Database Management', 'Programming Languages') for improved clarity and organization.
Ensure that **dates are formatted consistently** throughout the document (e.g., using a uniform month/year format) to maintain a professional and organized appearance.

Quantify achievements in the work experience section with **specific numbers and metrics** to demonstrate the impact of your contributions (e.g., 'Reduced reporting time by 25%' or 'Improved data accuracy by 15%').
Tailor the **summary section** to match the specific requirements and keywords of the job you are applying for, highlighting the skills and experience most relevant to the role.
Although not mandatory, adding a **link to a portfolio or GitHub repository** (if applicable) could further showcase skills and projects to potential employers.

RESUME_TIPS: In your work experience at KPMG, specify how you used **Power BI** to enhance inventory management. Highlight projects where you applied **forecasting techniques** or improved **inventory turnover ratio**. Mention specific improvements or efficiencies gained, such as a **reduction in stockouts** or an **increase in store fill rates**.

Under your skills, include proficiency in inventory planning methodologies like **ABC classification** and **EOQ (Economic Order Quantity)**. Provide brief explanations or examples to show your familiarity with these concepts. You could say: 'Experienced in applying **ABC classification** for inventory segmentation and optimizing order quantities using **EOQ**'.

Incorporate experience with **ERP systems** like **NetSuite**, **Zoho**, or **Unicommerce** if you have any. Even mentioning exposure to any **inventory planning tools** would be beneficial. Add it to your skills section and provide a brief description of its use.

When describing your experience with data modeling in **SQL**, relate it to inventory management. Mention how your models helped in better **replenishment strategies** or **allocation of stock**. For example, 'Developed normalized **SQL** models to facilitate efficient **replenishment planning**'.

Expand on your experience with cross-functional collaboration by mentioning specific interactions with **merchandising** or **sales teams**. Provide an example of how these collaborations improved **forecast accuracy** or optimized **inventory levels**. Mention you have experience in **omnichannel inventory** management if you have any.

In your summary, highlight your ability to balance **inventory availability** with **working capital efficiency**. State something like, 'Proficient in optimizing inventory levels to enhance profitability and reduce excess capital allocation'. Also, consider adding experience in **D2C brands**.

In the skills section, explicitly mention your experience with **allocation** strategies. Provide a concrete example of how you allocated stock for new launches, reorders, or high-performing SKUs, detailing the impact on **store fill rates**.

Include examples of your experience in **inventory optimization**, particularly in identifying and proposing actions for slow-moving and overstocked items. Quantify the results, such as '**reduced aging stock by X%**' or '**increased inventory turnover by Y%**'.

In your work experience, detail your experience in creating dashboards for inventory health. State, for example, that you 'Built **Power BI** dashboards to track **inventory turnover**, **forecast accuracy**, and **store performance**', emphasizing your contributions to inventory management.

In your skills, highlight your understanding of **min max levels** and **replenishment rules**. Include details such as, 'Experienced in defining and managing **min-max levels** for each store and **FOFO franchise** to optimize stock'. Also, consider adding experience in **Replenishment** strategies.

Inventory Planning.DESCRIPTION: This course teaches inventory management, demand planning, and supply chain optimization techniques.

Inventory Planning.COURSE_NAME: Inventory Management: How to Optimize Inventory
Inventory Planning.DESCRIPTION: Learn strategies to minimize costs and maximize efficiency in inventory control.
Covers the basics of inventory planning and control, including order quantity and safety stock.

Replenishment.DESCRIPTION: Learn how to use data analytics to improve replenishment and logistics decisions.
Covers best practices in planning and executing replenishment strategies.
Discusses techniques for effective replenishment strategies.

Allocation.DESCRIPTION: Learn how to use data analytics to optimize retail operations, including inventory allocation.

Allocation.COURSE_NAME: Retail Inventory Management: How to Improve Your Inventory
Allocation.DESCRIPTION: Focuses on improving inventory allocation and management in retail.
Explains inventory allocation strategies in supply chain management.

Inventory Optimization.DESCRIPTION: Teaches the best practices in inventory optimization.
Optimize your inventory processes, improve profits, and create a better customer experience.
Understand the basics of inventory optimization.

ABC classification.DESCRIPTION: Learn the ABC classification as one of many inventory control methods.
Using ABC Analysis to improve profits.
A quick overview of ABC Analysis in inventory management.

EOQ.DESCRIPTION: Best course to dive into Economic Order Quantity.
The easiest way to learn the ins and outs of EOQ.
